text: alm tshahd 'ana allah subhanah wteala yasuq alsahab 'iilaa hayth ysha', thuma yjmeh baed tfrqh, thuma yajealuh mtrakmana, fynzl min baynah almtr? wayunazil min alsahab aldhy yushbih aljibal fi ezmth baradana, fayusib bih man yasha' min eibadih wayasrifuh emman yasha' minhum bhsb hkmth wtqdyrh, yakad daw' dhlk albarq fi alsahab min shdth yadhhab babsar alnaazirin 'ilyh
